title: Why using UI-focused websites as a front-end beginner is a mistake?
description: I will help you to understand what is the design you see in websites like Behance and Dribbble.

title: How computers generate random values
description: Since computers are machines with no external conceptions of time and randomness, how computers can generate and understand the idea of random numbers?

title: Dealing with math as a bad student
description: If you are a software developer, you might have been asked (or even asked by yourself) if math knowledge was needed to be good at programming.
